Host Your Private Party at Our Fort Myers Event Venue
A special event at The Verandah is always a momentous occasion. From small luncheons with friends to fundraising galas, each and every special event we host is distinctively memorable to all who attend. We host some of the region’s most beautiful and grand events. The Verandah’s elegant surroundings and white glove staff can make your event magical and stress-free! Everything about The Verandah speaks to the charm, the inspiration, and the relaxed atmosphere that grace our special events. For couples seeking an equally picture-perfect setting for their big day, The Verandah also offers a gorgeous
wedding venue in Fort Myers
to make your ceremony as memorable as your reception.
Unforgettable Private Parties at The Verandah Club
Equipped for Any Party or Private Event
Extraordinary events begin during the planning phase, which is why we’re here to discuss your event well in advance. Our staff is ready to work with you to plan your perfect special event!
Catering options can be customized or our multi-talented Chefs can create their magic that will cater to your exact specifications. The cuisine that emerges from our kitchen on a daily basis is superb and always made from the freshest ingredients; carefully prepared by the best in the business. Then, it’s served by our highly professional wait staff who are there to help finish off the ultimate experience at your special event! From luxurious amenities to gorgeous surroundings and impeccable service, The Verandah makes an excellent choice for any special event.
Request Event Information
SharpSpring Form for Special Events Information

Stunning Golf Course Wedding Venue in Fort Myers
Say "I Do" at the Best Golf Course Wedding Venue in Fort Myers
With sweeping views of the Orange River, the picturesque tropical setting, and the surrounding coastal scenery, The Verandah offers the perfect location to host your special day.
With a Verandah wedding, you and all your guests will love the beautiful scenery of Southwest Florida, the wonderful service and dedication of our staff, and the gorgeous setting in our newly renovated River House.
The beautiful River House is the centerpiece of the entertaining scene at The Verandah Club. The elegant atmosphere lends itself to any style wedding, from intimate affairs with family, to the grandest, most elaborate occasions that will impress all your friends, family, and associates. Our goal is to help you instill a lasting memory of your special day at our gorgeous venue.
The dining area has been expanded to accommodate larger wedding parties. In addition, there’s a new, permanent dance floor, which will set the scene for a memorable evening. Furnishings and decor are updated, too, and lighting has been completely redone to ensure a storybook setting for your big day.
Customizing Your Wedding
The staff at The Verandah Club can accommodate your every wish for your wedding celebration. We’ll work with you or your planner to include special family traditions and other unique touches to make your wedding everything you’ve dreamed of. Our staff will be with you to help throughout the planning stages and on your wedding day attending to every detail and making sure all is perfect for the happy couple and their guests.
Whether your vision is a grand affair or an intimate celebration of your new life together, The Verandah can provide the setting, the staff, and all the special touches that make a wedding truly memorable.
Call us to tour the beautiful new property and start planning your special day
.
Book Your Fort Myers Golf Course Wedding Venue Today
The Food and Beverage Department at Verandah is dedicated to working with you toward the complete success of your event.
5000 square feet of space for entertaining
Magnificent riverfront views of the Golf Course
Superb cuisine prepared to your specifications by our talented, professional culinary staff
Well-appointed full-service bar
Delicious catering options customized to your taste and budget
Contact the Wedding and Event Specialist, Kaitlin Rook at
(239) 694-7229
or
